```{r}
# read industry data as individual dataframes
# each dataframe contains the same structure with Year and various measures

aircraft<-read_excel("data/source/aircraft_and_parts.xlsx")
blast<-read_excel("data/source/blast_furnaces_steel_mills.xlsx")
forge<-read_excel("data/source/iron_and_steel_forgings.xlsx")
foundry<-read_excel("data/source/iron_steel_foundries.xlsx")
vick<-read_excel("data/source/motor_vehicles_equipment.xlsx")
ordnance<-read_excel("data/source/other_transport.xlsx")
ship<-read_excel("data/source/ship_building_and_repairing.xlsx")
```
